thread.title: Russian model who hung from Dubai skyscraper summoned by police
thread.title_full: Russian model who hung from Dubai skyscraper summoned by police

author: Jessa Schroeder
title: Russian model who hung from Dubai skyscraper summoned by police
text:
Russian model who dangled from 1,000-foot Dubai skyscraper for social media shoot summoned by police Russian model who hung from Dubai skyscraper summoned by police   11:11 AM 
The cops weren’t impressed. 
Russian Instagram model Viktoria Odintcova was received a police summons after she was recorded performing a risky stunt on top of a 1,000-foot tall skyscraper for her social media page. 
The 22-year-old was ordered to sign a written statement ensuring she would not repeat the life-threatening video shoot, which saw her dangling 73 stories off of the Dubai Canyon Tower, the Sun reports . 
Police Major General Halil Ibragim Al-Mansuri said in a statement "the actions of the woman put her life at risk,” which initiated law enforcement to get involved. An aerial cityscape at sunset showing Dubai businesses; it is a hub of modern architecture. (Britus/Getty Images/iStockphoto) 
Since the video was released in January, Odintcova received widespread attention on the internet as well as backlash. 
“Super crazy, but amazing!” one of her Instagram followers said. 
Others were less forgiving of the stunt. 
“Proving beauty doesn't equal intelligence ... speechless by the amount of stupidity. No apparent safety equipment or precautions," one user wrote. 
Another said, “This is dumb. People will do anything for likes on Instagram, like almost die.” 
Since the confrontation, Odintcova insisted police should thank her for bringing awareness to safety issues on the Cayan Tower. 
The video has received 4,782,929 views and counting on YouTube. Join the Conversation:
